fields.name: DisplayTextSupportHoldCreateCase
fields.fieldText: Click Next to Create the Support Case and Generate a Case Number

fields.name: Account_Info
fields.fieldText:
The credit status on the Account record is not Approved:


“The account you are creating a case for is on Support Hold therefore please reference knowledge article :

000003752 - Administrative; All Products; Internal Support Procedure.

Customer on Support hold for information on transferring the customer to our Collections team or for next steps or see your supervisor.”

textTemplates.name: DescriptionTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Indicate additional contact(s) information:
Impacted Product/Environment Details:
Reason for Call/Issue:

textTemplates.name: tCaseDescriptionSupportHold
textTemplates.text: User contacted Support however their account is on Support Hold. Referenced knowledge article 000003752 - Administrative; All Products; Internal Support Procedure; Customer on Support hold and provided information on how to engage our Collections team. Advised the user to contact Amadeus Support once the outstanding invoices have been resolved. This case will be closed

textTemplates.name: tCaseSubjectSupportHold
textTemplates.text: Support Hold – Customer Contacted Support; Engaged the Collections Team
